name.too_short: Name must be at least 2 characters long
name.too_long: Name must be less than 100 characters
name.invalid_chars: Name can only contain letters and spaces

email.too_short: Email must be at least 5 characters long
email.too_long: Email must be no more than 254 characters
email.at_before_dot: The '@' must come before the last '.'
email.invalid_chars: Email must not contain spaces or non-ASCII characters
email.consecutive_dots: Email must not contain consecutive dots
email.starts_or_ends_with_dot: Email must not start or end with a dot
email.domain_starts_with_dot: The domain part must not start with a dot
email.missing_domain: Email must have a domain part after '@'
email.invalid_domain: The domain part of the email is invalid
email.invalid_domain_length: The domain part (after '@') must have at least 2 characters before the first dot
email.invalid_tld: The TLD (after the last '.') must be at least 2 characters long and alphabetic

password.too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password.too_long: Password must be no more than 128 characters long
password.missing_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.missing_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.missing_digit: Password must contain at least one digit
password.missing_special_char: Password must contain at least one special character
password.too_repetitive: Password contains too many repetitive characters
